content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. What’s your name so I can assist you with your HVAC needs?
Nice to meet you, Evelyn! Can you please provide the address where you need HVAC service?
Actually, I think I'm going to hold off on repairs for now. I'm planning to move soon and don't want to invest in this place. Thanks though!
Thank you for letting us know, Evelyn. If you need assistance in the future, we’d be happy to help you at your new place. Best of luck with your move!
reason: Customer declined to schedule due to upcoming move.
